data.eml:eml: The genus Nicostratus Distant from China (Hemiptera: Miridae: Deraeocorinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Jing-Yang, Liu, Guo-Qing (2007): The genus Nicostratus Distant from China (Hemiptera: Miridae: Deraeocorinae). Zootaxa 1467: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176591
